title: Dua of the traveller when he is leaving his loved ones - assim al hakeem
transcript: the following chapter supplication of the traveler for the resident so if I'm traveling and I'm bidding my family my friends my relatives farewell what should I say oh I place you in the trust of Allah whose trust is never misplaced so if I put you in the trust of Allah I know that when I come back I'll find you safe and sound
